The villa that we stay has two bedrooms and two baths. But one of the toilets is malfunctioning. It doesn't flush well. The toilet lid is broken. We asked the Villa maintenance team to fix it, but it was unsuccessful. They explained that the toilet should be replaced with a new one. I didn't ask when will it be replaced. We are staying three nights. 3 adults and 1 child. Now all of us need to use one toilet during our stay. No good.
The villa is equipped with kitchen, plates, old utensils, old kitchen sink, old cooking pots. It has a microwave and a refrigerator which work well. Thank Goodness!
We will choose other villa in our next visit to Seminyak Bali. We won't stay at La Mira.

text:
Mira Villa was a dream come true! 

The villa was amazing, we had a beautiful swimming pool for ourselves with hamacs and a floating flamingo, ideal to relax and sunbathe.

The house has a nice living room and connected kitchen, it has a TV with a lot of options to watch: youtube, netflix... 

The rooms are beautifully decorated with small balconies that look out to private fountains. The bathroom is amazing, it has a bathtub and a spacious shower with all the toiletries you need. 

The staff is super nice and gave us a very warm welcome. They were willing to help us in everything. 

In the morning they brought us a wonderfull floating breakfast to the swimming pool with vanilla waffles, omelette, fruit, juice... 

I would definately recommend the experience for all type of travellers: family, friends, couples. You won't regret!
